name: commutatorElement_def
initialProofState:
G : Type u_1
inst✝ : Group G
g₁ g₂ : G
⊢ Eq (Bracket.bracket g₁ g₂) (HMul.hMul (HMul.hMul (HMul.hMul g₁ g₂) (Inv.inv g₁)) (Inv.inv g₂))
decl:
theorem commutatorElement_def {G : Type*} [Group G] (g₁ g₂ : G) :
    ⁅g₁, g₂⁆ = g₁ * g₂ * g₁⁻¹ * g₂⁻¹ :=
  rfl
